name: myhosting.com
tag_list: web-hosting, vps, virtual-private-server, cloud-hosting, hosted-email, sharepoint, web-design
overview:
myhosting.com provides cloud hosting services to small and medium size businesses.

myhosting.com belongs to a group of brands owned by SoftCom Inc. The brand was establisged in 1997 as a web hosting business catering to the needs of SMB’s and later evolved to add multiple hosted services to its portfolio.

Today, myhosting.com offers virtual private servers, enterprise grade email based on Microsoft Exchange platform, SharePoint collaboration suite and various applications in the SaaS model.
